citation: Proclamation under the Justices of the Peace Act 2018 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Justices of the Peace Act 2018

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Justices of the Peace Act 2018 fix 1 July 2019 as the day on which that Act commences.

18 June 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2019

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
